entities.name: dudley
entities.description: Dudley is described as the one who is hitting Harry and making loud noises. He is also referred to by name multiple times in the passage.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is described as the one being hit by Dudley and feeling pain. He is also referred to by name multiple times in the passage.

relationships.description: Dudley attacks Harry with a fist, lifting him off his feet and causing pain. This is described as 'WHAM!' in the passage.
